techmeme.title: Sources: Satya Nadella and Microsoft execs moved quickly to get engineers to test and deploy R1 on Azure and GitHub in 10 days, an unusually fast turnaround (Tom Warren/The Verge)
DataBank, which provides high-performance compute-ready data centers for enterprise clients, raised $250M from PE firm TJC and $600M in a secondary share offer (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Sources: bankers trying to offload ~$3B in X debt claim X had $1.2B in adjusted EBITDA in 2024, roughly flat from before Elon Musk's buyout, a sign of recovery (Bloomberg)
AI audio startup ElevenLabs raised a $180M Series C co-led by a16z and ICONIQ Growth at a $3.3B post-money valuation, taking its total funding to $281M (TechCrunch)
The US DOJ sues to block HPE's $14B acquisition of Juniper Networks, arguing the deal would harm competition in the enterprise wireless equipment (Bloomberg)
